hero.title: About ATREUS PHYSIO
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in recovery and rehabilitation. Science-driven care with a personal touch.

founder.name: Dr. Swatheeshwaran
founder.bio: I'm Swatheeshwaran, and I started ATREUS PHYSIO because I wanted to create something different—a clinic where patients don't just get treated, but truly understand what's happening in their bodies. My journey began in sports physiotherapy, where I learned that recovery is as much about mindset as it is about exercises. Over the years, I've had the privilege of working with everyone from professional athletes to people dealing with everyday aches and pains, and each person has taught me something new about resilience and healing.
founder.experience: I spent three years as an Assistant Professor, which shaped how I communicate complex medical concepts in ways that actually make sense. Teaching forced me to think from the student's perspective, and I carry that same approach into patient care today. I've also been fortunate to work on the sidelines of major sporting events—national championships, state tournaments, and university competitions—where split-second decisions and rapid recovery protocols are part of the job. Those high-pressure environments taught me to stay calm, think clearly, and always put the athlete's long-term health first.

national: All India Aquatics, Beach Volleyball, Badminton, Basketball Championships (2023-2024)
state: TNBA Basketball Championships: Junior, Senior and State categories (2021-2022)
university: South Zone Football, Volleyball, Tennis, Basketball Tournaments (2021-2023)

founder.approach: I believe rehabilitation works best when it feels like a partnership, not a prescription. My approach starts with asking questions and really listening to your answers. From there, we build a plan that's grounded in evidence but flexible enough to adapt as you progress. I focus on movement quality, gradual strength building, and helping you understand why each exercise matters. The goal isn't just to make the pain go away—it's to give you the tools and confidence to prevent it from coming back. Every session, we're working together toward you being able to move, play, and live exactly how you want to.

philosophy.title: About Us
philosophy.intro: ATREUS PHYSIO started with a simple goal: to help people in Trichy move better, recover faster, and live without pain holding them back. We're a team that believes recovery shouldn't feel mysterious or overwhelming—it should make sense to you every step of the way.

sections.title: Why We Started ATREUS PHYSIO
sections.content: After years of working with athletes, teaching students, and treating patients from all walks of life, we realized something was missing in traditional physiotherapy. People wanted to understand their pain, not just mask it. They wanted to be partners in their recovery, not passive recipients. That's why we built ATREUS PHYSIO—a place where evidence-based care meets clear communication, and where every treatment plan is designed around your life, not a textbook.

sections.title: Our Treatment Philosophy
sections.content: We don't believe in quick fixes or cookie-cutter solutions. Instead, we start with a thorough assessment to understand what's really going on. Then we create a plan that actually makes sense—one that fits your schedule, your goals, and your body. Whether you're recovering from surgery, dealing with chronic pain, or training for your next marathon, we'll work with you to build strength, restore movement, and get you back to doing what you love.

sections.title: Movement First, Fear Out
sections.content: Pain can be scary, and it's easy to start avoiding activities you once enjoyed. We're here to change that. Through careful progression, education, and honest conversations, we help you rebuild confidence in your body. Movement isn't just about physical recovery—it's about reclaiming your independence and living without fear of re-injury.

sections.title: Our Background and Experience
sections.content: Our team brings experience from competitive sports, academic teaching, and hands-on clinical practice. We've worked with professional athletes at national tournaments, helped everyday people overcome chronic pain, and trained the next generation of physiotherapists. This blend of classroom teaching and real-world experience means we can explain complex concepts in simple terms and apply the latest research to your specific situation.

sections.title: How We Work With You
sections.content: Every session is a conversation, not a monologue. We listen to your concerns, explain what we find, and involve you in decisions about your care. You'll always know what we're doing and why it matters. Progress might not be linear, and that's okay—we'll adjust your plan as your body responds and your goals evolve. Rehabilitation is a journey we take together.

sections.title: Our Vision for ATREUS PHYSIO
sections.content: We want ATREUS PHYSIO to be more than just a clinic in Trichy. We want it to be a place where people feel heard, understood, and supported. A place where science meets empathy, and where every patient leaves not just feeling better, but understanding their body better too. That's what 'Reborn To Move Fearless' means to us—helping you rediscover the freedom to move, play, work, and live without limitations.
